audit_policy_status.name: audit_policy_status
audit_policy_status.notes: Resolved audit mode and write outcome for the current response.

capability_pack.name: capability_pack
capability_pack.notes: Versioned capability pack metadata exposed to Studio and headless clients.

capability_usage.name: capability_usage
capability_usage.notes: Deterministic capability usage entries emitted into run artifacts for replay/audit.

contract_warning.name: contract_warning
contract_warning.notes: Non-blocking contract validation warning emitted in dev/studio.

manifest_page.name: manifest_page
manifest_page.notes: Minimal page shape for deterministic UI manifests.

migration_status.name: migration_status
migration_status.notes: Deterministic migration status for runtime startup and inspection.

rag_state.name: rag_state
rag_state.notes: RAG-focused state subset used by upload, ingestion, and retrieval clients.

repro_bundle.name: repro_bundle
repro_bundle.notes: Minimal deterministic repro payload for Studio sharing.

retrieval_plan.name: retrieval_plan
retrieval_plan.notes: Serializable retrieval plan with filters, cutoffs, and deterministic ordering metadata.

retrieval_state.name: retrieval_state
retrieval_state.notes: Structured retrieval state shared by headless and Studio clients.

retrieval_trace_entry.name: retrieval_trace_entry
retrieval_trace_entry.notes: Deterministic retrieval evidence row used for citations and explainability.

run_artifact.name: run_artifact
run_artifact.notes: Deterministic replay artifact for a runtime flow/action execution.

run_diff.name: run_diff
run_diff.notes: Deterministic run diff comparing the latest two run artifacts.

run_diff_change.name: run_diff_change
run_diff_change.notes: Deterministic field-level diff entry for Studio run comparison.

run_response.name: run_response
run_response.notes: Forward-compatible aggregate envelope used by SDK examples.

trust_score_details.name: trust_score_details
trust_score_details.notes: Deterministic trust score metadata derived from retrieval evidence.

ui_manifest.name: ui_manifest
ui_manifest.notes: Canonical UI manifest payload shape consumed by headless and browser clients.

ui_state.name: ui_state
ui_state.notes: State envelope used by /api/ui/state and optional headless state inclusion.
